resources.string: TicTacGo! is an android variation on the classic game Tic-Tac-Toe or more generally known, Xs and Os. The goal of the game is to get either three Xs or Os in a row depending on what player you are, and to prevent the other player from getting three in a row. There are three output messages you may encounter: "X wins!", "O wins!", "Tie game!". We hope that this version of TicTacGo! is fun and that you can share the fun with your friends!
